title: Miracle Dieter Miyuki
original_name: ミラクルダイエッター MIYUKI
sinopse: Yukimi, a chubby junior high student, discovers a magical dumbbell that can transform her into Miyuki, a beautiful and slender young woman in a revealing costume. But she must do battle with an evil three-star chef who tempts young girls with calorie-rich treats and dubious weight loss products, and keep her identity secret from her family and schoolmates. (Source: M-U)
